p: The hypolipidemic potential of aqueous extracts was studied by the inhibition of pancreatic lipase [ 25]. A mixture of lipase (1 mg/mL), 4-nitrophenyl octanoate (substrate), and samples (from 25 to 4000 μg/mL) was prepared. After 30 min of incubation at 37 °C, the Tris-HCl buffer (pH 8.5) was added and the absorbance was measured at 405 nm.
